alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 08 at 7:33PM PST until December 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. 12-30" will be possible above 7,000 feet in the Sierra. In the White Mountains, 10-20" will be possible above 7,000 feet. 5-12" will be possible below 7,000 feet in both the Sierra and White Mountains. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph, resulting in areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult-to-impossible and dangerous. Blowing snow may result in visibility reductions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An incoming system is expected to bring moderate-to-heavy snow to the eastern Sierra slopes and the White Mountains of Inyo county over the weekend.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
